title: Our Team
subtitle: DELIVERING EXCEPTIONAL, PERSONALIZED CARE TO EVERY CORNER OF THE REGION.

members.name: Jason Kidushim
members.title: FOUNDER & CEO
members.bio: Jason is an accomplished healthcare leader with over a decade of experience. He has a proven track record of building mission-driven businesses that prioritize excellence.

members.name: Zehra Dhanani
members.title: VICE PRESIDENT OF OPERATIONS
members.bio: Zehra is a seasoned healthcare professional with a Master's degree in nursing and extensive experience across medical-surgical, orthopedic, and pediatric nursing.

members.name: David Kidushim
members.title: VICE PRESIDENT OF FINANCE
members.bio: David brings a wealth of expertise from an extensive background in finance, where he has successfully managed large-scale portfolios.

members.name: Sarah Brodbeck
members.title: DIRECTOR OF CARE COORDINATION
members.bio: Sarah brings over four years of experience in care coordination and three years in risk management within the homecare industry.

members.name: Elie Castillo
members.title: MANAGER OF CARE COORDINATION
members.bio: With a strong foundation in psychology and extensive experience in home care operations, Elie brings a strategic and empathetic approach to care coordination.

members.name: Cassie Leger
members.title: MANAGER OF CARE COORDINATION
members.bio: Cassie holds a Master's degree in Management & Leadership and a Bachelor's degree in Nutrition and Hospitality, bringing five years of home care industry experience.
